name: Painted Plush
description:
You receive a gift from a friend, It's a plush from the Paint Plush toy brand, You've never seen this toy before, so you start playing with it. 

PAINT PLUSH

It doesn't have company,It's not sold,What's this?A plush?A monster?Or an entity?

--Team--

art and animations-Chris Smoker

Programmer-Mikael Preci
